code: import"./Imageslider.css";import img1 from"../images/img1.jpg";import img2 from"../images/img2.jpg";import img3 from"../images/img3.jpg";import img4 from"../images/img4.jpg";import img5 from"../images/img5.jpg";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Imageslider=()=>{const[slider,setSlider]=useState(0);const data=[img1,img2,img3,img4,img5];const forward=()=>{setSlider(slider===data.length-1?0:slider+1);};const backward=()=>{setSlider(slider===0?data.length-1:slider-1);};useEffect(()=>{const sliderClear=setInterval(()=>{forward();},3000);return()=>clearInterval(sliderClear);}),[slider];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"slider",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"slider-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:data[slider],alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"btn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:backward,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa fa-arrow-left"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:forward,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa fa-arrow-right"})})]})]})});};export default Imageslider;
